User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; PPC Mac OS X Mach-O; en-US; rv:1.8) Gecko/20051111 Firefox/1.5
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; PPC Mac OS X Mach-O; en-US; rv:1.8) Gecko/20051111 Firefox/1.5

the page contains 2 images in a table/div construct. the top image, which is a banner ad does not show in my firefox. it works in all other browsers, including mozilla 1.7 and camino.

when clicking on "Inspect this page", the src= attribute for the image is missing, and style/display is set to 'none'

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.open page in browser
2.
3.

Actual Results:  
top image is missing, always

Expected Results:  
top image should show, always.


html validator likes the page too.
comments.creator: hpam@shaw.ca

WFM Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8) Gecko/20051111 Firefox/1.5

Adblock (and similar extensions) set the display: none; attribute on images. Check its settings for filters that may be triggering on your page.
